Topic.Title: What the hell is wrong with this P.O.S.

Message.Msg: if ebay was the only thing moving down, you'd have a valid question. its called consolidation, the market is taking a breather. ebay had been up 25% over the last 3 months, i dont think theres much to worry about. if you look at the chart for the last year you see several pullbacks, especially withing the 10 days prior to earnings. I think ebay will continue to outperform the market through the end of the year and took this opportunity to add.

Message.Title: BUY ALL U CAN
Message.Msg: gift here for long term buyers --- paypal is rocking !!!!

Message.Title: Congrats on finally making EBAY unusable
Message.Msg: Who is the GENIUS that decided thumbnails should be the full size of your screen?
